channel.title: Life, Fundamentals on Distributed Thoughts
channel.description: Recent content in Life, Fundamentals on Distributed Thoughts

item.title: Fundamentals
item.description: I restarted this blog to go back, remind and remember the fundamentals that brought me here. Fundamentals are the compass that keeps mind and reality together. Joel Goldberg, 45 years experienced software engineering veteran wrote a great article about basics. Focus on the Fundamentals Technology constantly changes, but some fundamental approaches to software development transcend these trends. Here are six fundamentals that will continue to be relevant for a long time.
